text: Dent on fuselage near cargo door. Maintenance: Measured dent depth, approved for flight under MEL conditions.
Loose rivets on fuselage panel. Maintenance: Removed and reinstalled with larger diameter fasteners.
Hydraulic leak in actuator housing. Maintenance: Replaced faulty seal, cleaned system, and pressure-tested.
Surface rust found on engine cowling. Maintenance: Sanded rust, applied anti-corrosion primer and repainted.
Crack detected at wing root. Maintenance: Inspected with ultrasonic, applied aluminum patch and epoxy sealant.
